hero.name: Hi, I'm Albert Stanley
hero.title: Building high-performance solutions
hero.summary: React and TypeScript specialist, I create digital experiences that combine clean code, intuitive design, and exceptional performance. My focus is transforming complex ideas into elegant and functional solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Here you can see more information about me and my current programming skills
about.description1: I'm a Frontend Developer and a Software Engineering Student. I build Web and Mobile Applications focused on extracting and implementing the best ideas. You can check some of my Projects in the next section.
about.description2: I'm open to Job opportunities where i can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills then don't hesitate to contact me.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: Scalable architectures following SOLID principles and development best practices

uxui.title: UX/UI Focus
uxui.description: Interfaces that prioritize usability and provide exceptional experiences

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Constant optimization for fast and efficient applications on any device

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Solutions I developed applying the best development and design practices
projects.ctaText: Want to see more work? Check out my GitHub profile!

githubSearch.title: GitHub Profile Search
githubSearch.description: Reactive interface for GitHub profile search with request optimization using Tanstack Query. I implemented robust state handling (loading/error) and debounce to improve user experience.

dedeApp.title: DedeApplication
dedeApp.description: Cross-platform app for health data management, developed with focus on performance and accessibility. I used Zustand for state management and implemented optimized navigation for iOS/Android.

googleAuth.title: Google OAuth Authentication
googleAuth.description: Complete authentication solution with Google OAuth 2.0 using BFF architecture. I implemented secure JWT token flow and native integration with Expo for a smooth experience.

portfolio.title: Portfólio Website
portfolio.description: Modern portfolio website built with React and TypeScript, featuring dark mode, internationalization and smooth animations.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: You can contact me in any of those social below. I will be contacting you back as soon as possible
